creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Selucia{x

Selucia is the Goddess of Nature. Mother nature so to speak. She's into
trees and animals, and not a big fan of the humanoid races that encroach on
her territory. The elves are her favorite of the humanoids and she definitly
favors them. She is not a big fan of industrious people and believes that
technology and civilization are evil. She gets along well with Aludra
and Nephium. Myst is her rival when it comes to men, although they do get
along on occasion. She hates Admanthos and does not like Malyki. Selucia's
followers gain many nature based spells, things that let them manipulate and
communicate with nature.
